About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi there! I'm Adryan Yudhatrisna from Jakarta, Indonesia. I have been learning to code since 2015. I find coding very enjoyable, and I love the challenge that coding provides. Routinely I get stuck and have to solve problems, but that challenge teaches me how to think and make me a better programmer.

I have experience programming in many different languages such as JavaScript, HTML 5, CSS 3, Java, SQL, and Ruby, but most of my projects involve working in JavaScript using NodeJs, React, and Angular.
